title: Individual maintenance including electricity bill and water charges if any, etc
clause_text: Individual maintenance including electricity bill and water charges if any, etc. of tenements shall be done by the slum dweller to whom the tenement is allotted.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Individual maintenance including electricity bill and water charges if any, etc. of tenements shall be done by the slum dweller to whom the tenement is allotted.
